articles.title: More Countries Impose COVID Restrictions on Travelers From China - Voice of America

articles.author: Rachel Gilmore, Mackenzie Gray
articles.title: Arrest made over Twitter threats to kill MPs, 'destroy' Parliament, embassies: court docs | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: "The threats targeted Parliament Hill, the Department of Defense, the Embassy of the People's Republic of China, as well as the Embassy of the United States of America in Ottawa."
articles.content:
A 19-year-old Ottawa man has been arrested for “posting numerous threats on Twitter,” the Royal Canadian Mounted Police say.
According to a press release Tuesday, the arrest comes after the RCMP’s I… [+2547 chars]
